Posts.Content: I also had a normal mammogram 3 months before I discovered a lump in my breast. By all means, see the surgeon and ask for an excisional biopsy to take the lump out. That way, they will know exactly what the lump is. Everyone told me not to worry, but as it turned out, my lump was infiltrating ductal cell carcinoma.
Posts.Title: Breast lump-normal mammogram?
